step_feedback.feedback: Good job finding a comfortable position. Keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on your breath.
Nicely done placing your hands on your abdomen. Feel the gentle rise as you prepare to inhale.
Excellent inhale! Remember to tighten your whole body muscles slightly and imagine fluid moving towards your chest.
Great exhale! Relax your muscles completely and visualize pushing fluid away from your chest.
You're maintaining a good posture. Focus on a slow, controlled breath in.
Hands are well-placed. Continue to feel your abdomen expand with the inhale.
Very good inhale and muscle tightening. Keep that visualization of fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. You're effectively promoting fluid movement with each breath.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! You consistently found a comfortable position, placed your hands correctly, and performed controlled inhales and exhales. Remember to keep tightening your body muscles on the inhale and relaxing on the exhale to maximize lymphatic drainage.
